17333949Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Tuple<T, T>> Pairs<T>(IEnumerable<T> input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var array = new T[2];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var x in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array[i] = x;Di2015NewLine        i = (i + 1) % 2;Di2015NewLine        if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Tuple.Create(array[0], array[1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Tuple<string, string>> WordsFromPascalCasedString(string pascalCasedString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rx = new Regex("([A-Z])");Di2015NewLine    var output = rx.Split(pascalCasedString)Di2015NewLine                   .Where(c => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(c));Di2015NewLine    var items = Pairs(output);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17333949Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batches<T>(IEnumerable<T> input, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var array = new T[n];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var x in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array[i] = x;Di2015NewLine        i = (i + 1) % n;Di2015NewLine        if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return array.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (i != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return array.Take(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17336561Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Assign(XElement xe, string name, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XElement el = xe.Descendants()Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault(e => e.Name.LocalName == "t" && e.Value.Contains("(@" + name + ")"));Di2015NewLine    if (el != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        el.Value = el.Value.Replace("(@" + name + ")", value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AssignFallback(xe, name, value);Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17336561Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AssignFallback(XElement xe, string name, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string varName = "(@" + name + ")";Di2015NewLine    XElement xep = xe.Descendants()Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(x => x.Name.LocalName == "p" && x.Value.Contains(varName));Di2015NewLine    if (xep == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string prefix = "", sufix = "";Di2015NewLine    List<XElement> truns = new List<XElement>();Di2015NewLine    List<XElement> allruns = xep.Descendants().Where(x => x.Name.LocalName == "r").ToList();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < allruns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!allruns[i].Value.Contains("(@"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int index = allruns[i].Value.IndexOf("(@");Di2015NewLine        prefix = allruns[i].Value.Substring(0, index);Di2015NewLine        truns.Clear();Di2015NewLine        truns.Add(allruns[i]);Di2015NewLine        string nameTemp = allruns[i].Value.Substring(index, allruns[i].Value.Length - index);Di2015NewLine        if (!varName.StartsWith(nameTemp))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < allruns.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            nameTemp += allruns[j].Value;Di2015NewLine            truns.Add(allruns[j]);Di2015NewLine            if (nameTemp.StartsWith(varName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sufix = nameTemp.Substring(varName.Length);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (nameTemp.Length > varName.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (nameTemp.StartsWith(varName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XElement xet = truns[0].Descendants().FirstOrDefault(x => x.Name.LocalName == "t");Di2015NewLine            xet.Value = prefix + value + sufix;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j < truns.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                truns[j].Remove();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17339345Di2015UniqueSeparator// You could turn this into a struct if you wanted.Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class IdPair : IEquatable<IdPair>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int first;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int second;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int First { get { return first; } }Di2015NewLine    public int Second { get { return second; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IdPair(int first, int second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.first = first;Di2015NewLine        this.second = second;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is order-neutral.Di2015NewLine        // Could use multiplication, addition etc instead - the point isDi2015NewLine        // that {x, y}.GetHashCode() must equal {y, x}.GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        return first ^ second; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(x as IdPair);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(IdPair other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (other == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (first == other.first && second == other.second) ||Di2015NewLine               (first == other.second && second == other.first);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17342017Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Point Rotate(Point point, Point pivot, double angleDegree)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double angle = angleDegree * Math.PI / 180;Di2015NewLine    double cos = Math.Cos(angle);Di2015NewLine    double sin = Math.Sin(angle);Di2015NewLine    int dx = point.X - pivot.X;Di2015NewLine    int dy = point.Y - pivot.Y;Di2015NewLine    double x = cos * dx - sin * dy + pivot.X;Di2015NewLine    double y = sin * dx + cos * dy + pivot.X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Point rotated = new Point((int)Math.Round(x), (int)Math.Round(y));Di2015NewLine    return rotated;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Rotate(new Point(1, 1), new Point(0, 0), 45));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17345969Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> ExceptBy<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TSource> other,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, TKey> selector,Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    comparer = comparer ?? 17348527Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyDataStructure<T>//TODO come up with better nameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, int> columns;Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, int> rows;Di2015NewLine    private List<List<T>> data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyDataStructure(Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<string> rows,Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<string> columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.columns = columns.Select((name, index) => new { name, index })Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(x => x.name, x => x.index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.rows = rows.Select((name, index) => new { name, index })Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(x => x.name, x => x.index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        initData();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void initData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data = new List<List<T>>(rows.Count);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < rows.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data.Add(new List<T>(columns.Count));Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < columns.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data[i].Add(default(T));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T this[string row, string column]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //TODO error checking for invalid row/column valuesDi2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return data[rows[row]][columns[column]];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[rows[row]][columns[column]] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddColumn(string column)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        columns.Add(column, columns.Count);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[i].Add(default(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddRow(string row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rows.Add(row, rows.Count);Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<T>(columns.Count);Di2015NewLine        data.Add(list);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(default(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool RenameRow(string oldRow, string newRow)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rows.ContainsKey(oldRow) && !rows.ContainsKey(newRow))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Add(newRow, rows[oldRow]);Di2015NewLine            this.Remove(oldRow);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17349445Di2015UniqueSeparatorInterlocked
17349445Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int lastValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int LastValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This won't actually change the value - basically if the value *was* 0,Di2015NewLine    // it gets set to 0 (no change). If the value *wasn't* 0, it doesn't getDi2015NewLine    // changed either.Di2015NewLine    get { return Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref lastValue, 0, 0); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will definitely change the value - we ignore the return value, becauseDi2015NewLine    // we don't need it.Di2015NewLine    set { Interlocked.Exchange(ref lastValue, value); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17350164Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static Byte[] BmpToArray(Bitmap value) {Di2015NewLine      BitmapData data = value.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, value.Width, value.Height),   ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, value.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      try {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr ptr = data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        int bytes = Math.Abs(data.Stride) * value.Height;Di2015NewLine        byte[] rgbValues = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rgbValues;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      finally {Di2015NewLine        value.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17354145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void HtmlDecode(string value, TextWriter output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (output == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("output");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!StringRequiresHtmlDecoding(value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.Write(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int length = value.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool flag;Di2015NewLine                uint num4;Di2015NewLine                char ch = value[i];Di2015NewLine                if (ch != '&')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    goto Label_01B6;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                int num3 = value.IndexOfAny(_htmlEntityEndingChars, i + 1);Di2015NewLine                if ((num3 <= 0) || (value[num3] != ';'))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    goto Label_01B6;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                string entity = value.Substring(i + 1, (num3 - i) - 1);Di2015NewLine                if ((entity.Length <= 1) || (entity[0] != '#'))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    goto Label_0188;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if ((entity[1] == 'x') || (entity[1] == 'X'))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    flag = uint.TryParse(entity.Substring(2), NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier, NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo, out num4);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    flag = uint.TryParse(entity.Substring(1), NumberStyles.Integer, NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo, out num4);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (flag)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    switch (_htmlDecodeConformance)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case UnicodeDecodingConformance.Strict:Di2015NewLine                            flag = (num4 < 0xd800) || ((0xdfff < num4) && (num4 <= 0x10ffff));Di2015NewLine                            goto Label_0151;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        case UnicodeDecodingConformance.Compat:Di2015NewLine                            flag = (0 < num4) && (num4 <= 0xffff);Di2015NewLine                            goto Label_0151;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        case UnicodeDecodingConformance.Loose:Di2015NewLine                            flag = num4 <= 0x10ffff;Di2015NewLine                            goto Label_0151;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    flag = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            Label_0151:Di2015NewLine                if (!flag)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    goto Label_01B6;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (num4 <= 0xffff)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Write((char) num4);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char ch2;Di2015NewLine                    char ch3;Di2015NewLine                    ConvertSmpToUtf16(num4, out ch2, out ch3);Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(ch2);Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(ch3);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i = num3;Di2015NewLine                goto Label_01BD;Di2015NewLine            Label_0188:Di2015NewLine                i = num3;Di2015NewLine                char ch4 = HtmlEntities.Lookup(entity);Di2015NewLine                if (ch4 != '\\0')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ch = ch4;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Write('&');Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(entity);Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(';');Di2015NewLine                    goto Label_01BD;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            Label_01B6:Di2015NewLine                output.Write(ch);Di2015NewLine            Label_01BD:;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17354145Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HtmlDecode(string html)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (html == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (html.IndexOf('&') < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return html;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    StringWriter writer = new StringWriter(sb, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    int length = html.Length;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char ch = html[i];Di2015NewLine        if (ch == '&')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int num3 = html.IndexOfAny(s_entityEndingChars, i + 1);Di2015NewLine            if ((num3 > 0) && (html[num3] == ';'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string entity = html.Substring(i + 1, (num3 - i) - 1);Di2015NewLine                if ((entity.Length > 1) && (entity[0] == '#'))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if ((entity[1] == 'x') || (entity[1] == 'X'))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ch = (char) int.Parse(entity.Substring(2), NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ch = (char) int.Parse(entity.Substring(1), CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        i = num3;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (FormatException)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        i++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        i++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i = num3;Di2015NewLine                    char ch2 = HtmlEntities.Lookup(entity);Di2015NewLine                    if (ch2 != '\\0')Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ch = ch2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        writer.Write('&');Di2015NewLine                        writer.Write(entity);Di2015NewLine                        writer.Write(';');Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(ch);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17362288Di2015UniqueSeparator        String myUrl = "www.facebook.com";Di2015NewLine        System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex url = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(@"/^(https?:\\/\\/)?([\\da-z\\.-]+)\\.([a-z\\.]{2,6})([\\/\\w \\.-]*)*\\/?$/", System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection matches = url.Matches(myUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string matchedUrl = match.Groups["url"].Value;Di2015NewLine            Uri uri = new UriBuilder(matchedUrl).Uri;Di2015NewLine            myUrl = myUrl.Replace(matchedUrl, uri.AbsoluteUri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17366960Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void executeCommandFiles()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (string test in listboxTestsToRun.Items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //gets the directory name from given filename (filename without extension)Di2015NewLine        //assumes that only the last '.' is for the extension. test.1.cmd => test.1Di2015NewLine        string testName = test.Substring(0, test.LastIndexOf('.')); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set up a FileInfo object so we can make sure the test exists gracefully.Di2015NewLine        FileInfo testFile = new FileInfo(@"Y:\\Tests\\" + testName + "\\\\" + test);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //check if it is a valid pathDi2015NewLine        if (testFile.Exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProcessStartInfo startInfo = new ProcessStartInfo(testFile.FullName);Di2015NewLine            //get the Process object so we can wait for it to finish.Di2015NewLine            Process currentTest = Process.Start(startInfo);Di2015NewLine            //wait 5 minutes then timeout (5m * 60s * 1000ms)Di2015NewLine            bool completed = currentTest.WaitForExit(300000);Di2015NewLine            if (!completed)Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("test timed out");Di2015NewLine            //use this if you want to wait for the test to complete (indefinitely)Di2015NewLine            //currentTest.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Error: " + testFile.FullName + " was not found.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17367869Di2015UniqueSeparatorint AudioReader::RetrieveSamples(Di2015NewLine     float * sampleBuffer,Di2015NewLine     int dataLength,Di2015NewLine     int * /* out */ written)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     // assuming mydata is already definedDi2015NewLine     if(sampleBuffer == NULL || dataLength == 0)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         *written = sizeof(mydata);Di2015NewLine         return -1;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     ZeroMemory(sampleBuffer, dataLength);Di2015NewLine     int toCopy = min(dataLength, sizeof(myData));Di2015NewLine     //This is where I copy the actual data into mydataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     memcpy(sampleBuffer, mydata, toCopy);Di2015NewLine     *written = toCopy;Di2015NewLine     return 0;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
17367869Di2015UniqueSeparator [DLLImport("__internal")]Di2015NewLine private static extern int GetSamples(Di2015NewLine     [In, Out]IntPtr buffer,Di2015NewLine     [In] int length,Di2015NewLine     [Out] out int written);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine float[] RetrieveFloats()Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     int bytesToAllocate = 0;Di2015NewLine     GetSamples(IntPtr.Zero, 0, out bytesToAllocate);Di2015NewLine     if(bytesToAllocate == 0)Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine     int floatCount = bytesToAllocate/ sizeof(float);Di2015NewLine     float[] toReturn = new float[floatCount];Di2015NewLine     IntPtr allocatedMemory = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(bytesToAllocate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int written = 0;Di2015NewLine     if(GetSamples(allocatedMemory, bytesToAllocate, out written) != -1)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         floatCount = written/sizeof(float);Di2015NewLine         Marshal.Copy(allocatedMemory, toReturn, 0, floatCount);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     Marshal.FreeHGlobal(allocatedMemory);Di2015NewLine     return toReturn;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

17368469Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Order<IBusinessEntity> (List<IBusinessEntity> filteredList, List<IBusinessEntity> fullList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Getting list of ID from all business entities.Di2015NewLine    HashSet<long> ids = new HashSet<long>(filteredList.Select(x => x.ID));Di2015NewLine    //Ordering the listDi2015NewLine    return fullList.OrderByDescending(x => ids.Contains(x.ID)).ThenBy(x => !ids.Contains(x.ID)).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17368649Di2015UniqueSeparator //Variable to track GripInterationStatusDi2015NewLine bool isGripinInteraction = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnQuery(object sender, QueryInteractionStatusEventArgs handPointerEventArgs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If a grip detected change the cursor image to gripDi2015NewLine            if (handPointerEventArgs.HandPointer.HandEventType == HandEventType.Grip)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isGripinInteraction = true;Di2015NewLine                handPointerEventArgs.IsInGripInteraction = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //If Grip Release detected change the cursor image to openDi2015NewLine            else if (handPointerEventArgs.HandPointer.HandEventType == HandEventType.GripRelease)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isGripinInteraction = false;Di2015NewLine                handPointerEventArgs.IsInGripInteraction = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If no change in state do not change the cursorDi2015NewLine            else if (handPointerEventArgs.HandPointer.HandEventType == HandEventType.None)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                handPointerEventArgs.IsInGripInteraction = isGripinInteraction;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            handPointerEventArgs.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17369975Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void prime () {Di2015NewLine    int limit = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * Starting at 2, assuming the first prime number is 2Di2015NewLine     * Test all numbers against any number from 2, if theDi2015NewLine     * number being tested is a multiple of some otherDi2015NewLine     * previous number, that number is NOT a primeDi2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    for (int being_tested = 2; being_tested <= limit; being_tested++) {Di2015NewLine        for (int previous_value = 2; previous_value <= limit; previous_value++) {Di2015NewLine            /**Di2015NewLine             * If previous_value == being_tested thenDi2015NewLine             * no multiples have been foundDi2015NewLine             * thus "being_tested" is a prime numberDi2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine            if (being_tested == previous_value) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(being_tested);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            /**Di2015NewLine             * If modulus == 0 then "being_tested"Di2015NewLine             * is a multiple of previous_value,Di2015NewLine             * therefore, not a prime numberDi2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine            else if (being_tested % previous_value == 0) {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17374746Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool HasJpegHeader(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(File.Open(filename, FileMode.Open)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UInt16 soi = br.ReadUInt16();  // Start of Image (SOI) marker (FFD8)Di2015NewLine        UInt16 jfif = br.ReadUInt16(); // JFIF marker (FFE0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return soi == 0xd8ff && jfif == 0xe0ff;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17376726Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace demo.encryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class CryptoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Crypto()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String encrypto(string te, string ps,Di2015NewLine              string Salt = "Kosher", string HashAlgorithm = "SHA1",Di2015NewLine              int PasswordIterations = 2, string InitialVector = "OFRna73m*aze01xY",Di2015NewLine              int KeySize = 256)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(te))Di2015NewLine                return "";Di2015NewLine            byte[] InitialVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(InitialVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] SaltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Salt);Di2015NewLine            byte[] PlainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(te);Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes DerivedPassword = new PasswordDeriveBytes(ps, SaltValueBytes, HashAlgorithm, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine            byte[] KeyBytes = DerivedPassword.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged SymmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SymmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            byte[] CipherTextBytes = null;Di2015NewLine            using (ICryptoTransform Encryptor = SymmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(KeyBytes, InitialVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream MemStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream CryptoStream = new CryptoStream(MemStream, Encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        CryptoStream.Write(PlainTextBytes, 0, PlainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                        CryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                        CipherTextBytes = MemStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                        MemStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                        CryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            SymmetricKey.Clear();Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(CipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String decrypto(string ct, string ps,Di2015NewLine              string Salt = "Kosher", string HashAlgorithm = "SHA1",Di2015NewLine             int PasswordIterations = 2, string InitialVector = "OFRna73m*aze01xY",Di2015NewLine             int KeySize = 256)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ct))Di2015NewLine                return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] InitialVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(InitialVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] SaltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Salt);Di2015NewLine            byte[] CipherTextBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(ct);Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes DerivedPassword = new PasswordDeriveBytes(ps, SaltValueBytes, HashAlgorithm, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine            byte[] KeyBytes = DerivedPassword.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged SymmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            SymmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            byte[] PlainTextBytes = new byte[CipherTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLine            int ByteCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            using (ICryptoTransform Decryptor = SymmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(KeyBytes, InitialVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream MemStream = new MemoryStream(CipherTextBytes))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream CryptoStream = new CryptoStream(MemStream, Decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        ByteCount = CryptoStream.Read(PlainTextBytes, 0, PlainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        MemStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                        CryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SymmetricKey.Clear();Di2015NewLine            return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(PlainTextBytes, 0, ByteCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17377715Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LruCache<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _capacity;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Stopwatch _stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Reference<T> where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine   public T Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TValue Value;Di2015NewLine        public volatile Reference<long> Ticks;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, Node> _nodes = new ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LruCache(int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(capacity > 10);Di2015NewLine        _capacity = capacity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Set(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = new NodeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Value = value,Di2015NewLine            Ticks = new Reference<long> { Value = _stopwatch.ElapsedTicks }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _nodes.AddOrUpdate(key, node, (_, __) => node);Di2015NewLine        if (_nodes.Count > _capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var source in _nodes.OrderBy(x => x.Value.Ticks).Take(_nodes.Count / 10))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Node _;Di2015NewLine                _nodes.TryRemove(source.Key, out _);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryGet(TKey key, out TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node node;Di2015NewLine        if (_nodes.TryGetValue(key, out node))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Ticks = new Reference<long> {Value = _stopwatch.ElapsedTicks};Di2015NewLine            value = node.Value;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        value = default(TValue);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17378971Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask.Delay
17378971Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task Delay(int millisecondsDelay, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //error checkingDi2015NewLine  Task.DelayPromise delayPromise = new Task.DelayPromise(cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine  if (cancellationToken.CanBeCanceled)Di2015NewLine    delayPromise.Registration = cancellationToken.InternalRegisterWithoutEC((Action<object>) (state => ((Task.DelayPromise) state).Complete()), (object) delayPromise);Di2015NewLine  if (millisecondsDelay != -1)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    delayPromise.Timer = new Timer((TimerCallback) (state => ((Task.DelayPromise) state).Complete()), (object) delayPromise, millisecondsDelay, -1);Di2015NewLine    delayPromise.Timer.KeepRootedWhileScheduled();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return (Task) delayPromise;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17378971Di2015UniqueSeparatorDelayPromise
17378971Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate sealed class DelayPromise : Task<VoidTaskResult>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  internal readonly CancellationToken Token;Di2015NewLine  internal CancellationTokenRegistration Registration;Di2015NewLine  internal Timer Timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  internal DelayPromise(CancellationToken token)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.Token = token;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  internal void Complete()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (!(this.Token.IsCancellationRequested ? this.TrySetCanceled(this.Token) : this.TrySetResult(new VoidTaskResult())))Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    if (this.Timer != null)Di2015NewLine      this.Timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    this.Registration.Dispose();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17379235Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns a sequence of window handles (IntPtrs) for all top-level windowsDi2015NewLine/// matching the specfied window class name.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="className">The windows class name to match (not to be confused with a C# class name!)</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A non-null sequence of window handles. This will be an empty sequence if no windows match the class name.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IntPtr> WindowsMatchingClassName(string className)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(className))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("className", className, "className can't be null or blank.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return WindowsByClassFinder.WindowsMatching(className);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Finds windows matching a particular window class name.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class WindowsByClassFinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Find the windows matching the specified class name.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IntPtr> WindowsMatching(string className)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new WindowsByClassFinder(className)._result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private WindowsByClassFinder(string className)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _className = className;Di2015NewLine        EnumWindows(callback, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool callback(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lparam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (GetClassName(hWnd, _apiResult, _apiResult.Capacity) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.CompareOrdinal(_apiResult.ToString(), _className) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _result.Add(hWnd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true; // Keep enumerating.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Security", "CA2118:ReviewSuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityUsage"), SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurity]Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine    private extern static bool EnumWindows(EnumWindowsDelegate lpEnumFunc, IntPtr lparam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int GetClassName(IntPtr hWnd, StringBuilder lpClassName, int nMaxCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate bool EnumWindowsDelegate(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lparam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly string _className;Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<IntPtr> _result = new List<IntPtr>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly StringBuilder _apiResult = new StringBuilder(1024);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17383911Di2015UniqueSeparatorint FloatingVoxelsFlood(int x, int y, int z, ref bool[] voxelsAttached) {Di2015NewLine    if (GetPixel(x, y, z).a > 0.5f) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Queue<Pixel> queue = new Queue<Pixel>();Di2015NewLine    queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(x, y, z));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(queue.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine        Pixel p = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int id = GetPixelId(p.x, p.y, p.z);Di2015NewLine        if (!voxelsAttached[id] && GetPixel(p.x, p.y, p.z).a < 0.5f) {Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            voxelsAttached[id] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int minx = p.x-1;Di2015NewLine            int maxx = p.x+1;Di2015NewLine            if (minx >= 0) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(minx, p.y, p.z));Di2015NewLine            if (maxx < volumeWidth) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(maxx, p.y, p.z));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int miny = p.y-1;Di2015NewLine            int maxy = p.y+1;Di2015NewLine            if (miny >= 0) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(p.x, miny, p.z));Di2015NewLine            if (maxy < volumeHeight) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(p.x, maxy, p.z));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int minz = p.z-1;Di2015NewLine            int maxz = p.z+1;Di2015NewLine            if (minz >= 0) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(p.x, p.y, minz));Di2015NewLine            if (maxz < volumeDepth) Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(new Pixel(p.x, p.y, maxz));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator(
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator@"^.*?(?=\\()"Di2015NewLine
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator@"^[a-zA-Z]*(?=\\()"Di2015NewLine
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator^           Matches the beginning of the stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine.*?         One or more of any character. The trailing ? means 'non-greedy', Di2015NewLine            which means the minimum characters that match, rather than the maximumDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(?=         This means 'zero-width positive lookahead assertion'. That means that the Di2015NewLine            containing expression won't be included in the match.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\(          Escapes the ( character (since it has special meaning in regular Di2015NewLine            expressions)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine)           Closes off the lookaheadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[a-zA-Z]*?  Zero or more of any character from a to z, or from A to ZDi2015NewLine
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator.*?
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator[^\\)]*
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator^
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator[...]
17385169Di2015UniqueSeparator@"^[^\\(]*(?=\\()"Di2015NewLine

17386838Di2015UniqueSeparator private Dictionary<string, object> GetRegistrySubKeys()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, object>  valuesBynames   = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine        const string REGISTRY_ROOT = @"SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\";Di2015NewLine        //Here I'm looking under LocalMachine. You can replace it with Registry.CurrentUser for current user...Di2015NewLine        using (RegistryKey rootKey = Registry.CurrentUser.OpenSubKey(REGISTRY_ROOT))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        if (rootKey != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] valueNames = rootKey.GetValueNames();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string currSubKey in valueNames)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object value = rootKey.GetValue(currSubKey);Di2015NewLine                valuesBynames.Add(currSubKey, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        rootKey.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return valuesBynames;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17387605Di2015UniqueSeparatorVkKeyScan
17387605Di2015UniqueSeparatorToAscii
17387605Di2015UniqueSeparator    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern short VkKeyScan(char c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern int ToAscii(Di2015NewLine        uint uVirtKey,Di2015NewLine        uint uScanCode,Di2015NewLine        byte[] lpKeyState,Di2015NewLine        out uint lpChar,Di2015NewLine        uint flagsDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine
17387605Di2015UniqueSeparatorToAscii
17387605Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static char GetModifiedKey(char c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    short vkKeyScanResult = VkKeyScan(c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // a result of -1 indicates no key translates to input characterDi2015NewLine    if (vkKeyScanResult == -1)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("No key mapping for " + c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // vkKeyScanResult & 0xff is the base key, without any modifiersDi2015NewLine    uint code = (uint)vkKeyScanResult & 0xff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set shift key pressedDi2015NewLine    byte[] b = new byte[256];Di2015NewLine    b[0x10] = 0x80;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    uint r;Di2015NewLine    // return value of 1 expected (1 character copied to r)Di2015NewLine    if (1 != ToAscii(code, code, b, out r, 0))Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("Could not translate modified state");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (char)r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17391833Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public string GetMd5Sum(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //vBulletin uses UTF8 as strings, so you need to pass the user input string as UTF8 alsoDi2015NewLine        Encoder enc = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetEncoder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create a byte[] array to store the new UTF8 stringDi2015NewLine        byte[] utf8text = new byte[str.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Pass the string to the byte[] arrayDi2015NewLine        enc.GetBytes(str.ToCharArray(), 0, str.Length, utf8text , 0, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Hash the byte[] array with our UTF8 string insideDi2015NewLine        MD5 md5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        byte[] result = md5.ComputeHash(utf8text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Build the final string by converting each byteDi2015NewLine        //into hex and appending it to a StringBuilderDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < result.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(result[i].ToString("x2")); //x2 here so the outcome result is all in lowercase, couse vbulleting also stores all in lowercaseDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //And return itDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get the user input password as plain textDi2015NewLine        string pass = textBox1.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Here i provided the salt explicit that i took from the databaseDi2015NewLine        string salt = "N1GOt=>8sdO@E54)PH2@NCm5yI#]3u";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Here we convert the plain text password into the first hashDi2015NewLine        string p1 = GetMd5Sum(pass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Here we add the salt to the previous hashed passwordDi2015NewLine        string p2 = p1 + salt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Here we hash again the previous hashed password + the salt stringDi2015NewLine        string final = GetMd5Sum(p2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //this was just to the test to see if it all works as intendedDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(final);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17392715Di2015UniqueSeparator// helper classes which compiles a fast, type-safe delegate for writing various typesDi2015NewLinestatic class MyBinaryWriterHelper<T> {Di2015NewLine    public static readonly Action<MyBinaryWriter, T> WriteAction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this initialization is a bit expensive, but it will occur only onceDi2015NewLine    // for each writable type T and will occur lazilyDi2015NewLine    static {Di2015NewLine        // find the existing Write(T) on the MyBinaryWriter typeDi2015NewLine        var writeMethod = typeof(MyBinaryWriter).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name == "Write" Di2015NewLine                && m.GetArguments().Length == 1Di2015NewLine                && m.GetArguments()[0](p => p.ParameterType == typeof(T)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if there is no such method, failDi2015NewLine        if (writeMethod == null) { throw ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // build up an expression (writer, t) => writer.Write(t)Di2015NewLine        var writerParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(MyBinaryWriter));Di2015NewLine        var tParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Call(writerParam, writeMethod, tParam);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<MyBinaryWriter, T>>(call, new[] { writerParam, tParam });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compile the expression to a delegate, caching the result statically in theDi2015NewLine        // readonly WriteAction fieldDi2015NewLine        WriteAction = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// then in your writer classDi2015NewLinepublic void Write<T>(IEnumerable<T> collection) {Di2015NewLine    // other collection writing logic (e. g. writing the count) ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // to write out the items, just use the static action fieldDi2015NewLine    foreach (var t in collection) {Di2015NewLine        MyBinaryWriterHelper<T>.WriteAction(this, t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17395307Di2015UniqueSeparatorSleep()
17395307Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public const double MillisecondsBetweenMoves = (double)100;Di2015NewLine        public const double DistancePerSecond = (double)10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point ptStart = new Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Point ptStop = new Point(70, 15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int deltaX = ptStop.X - ptStart.X;Di2015NewLine            int deltaY = ptStop.Y - ptStart.Y;Di2015NewLine            double DistanceToTravel = Math.Sqrt((deltaX * deltaX) + (deltaY * deltaY));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStart.X, ptStart.Y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("a");Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStop.X, ptStop.Y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("b");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double TimeRequiredInMilliseconds = DistanceToTravel / DistancePerSecond * (double)1000;Di2015NewLine            Stopwatch SW = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine            SW.Start();Di2015NewLine            while (SW.ElapsedMilliseconds < TimeRequiredInMilliseconds)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep((int)MillisecondsBetweenMoves);Di2015NewLine                Point position = new Point(Di2015NewLine                    ptStart.X + (int)((double)SW.ElapsedMilliseconds / TimeRequiredInMilliseconds * (double)deltaX),Di2015NewLine                    ptStart.Y + (int)((double)SW.ElapsedMilliseconds / TimeRequiredInMilliseconds * (double)deltaY)Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine                Console.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStart.X, ptStart.Y);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("a");Di2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStop.X, ptStop.Y);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("b");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(position.X, position.Y);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("X");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStart.X, ptStart.Y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("a");Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStop.X, ptStop.Y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("b");Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(ptStop.X, ptStop.Y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("X");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17397038Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>A set of pictures</summary>Di2015NewLinepublic struct PictureSetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Offset { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public IList<Picture> Pictures { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Clients will use this property if they want to pick up where they left off</summary>Di2015NewLine    public int NextOffset { get { return Offset + Pictures.Count; } }Di2015NewLine    public PictureSet(int offset, IList<Picture> pictures)Di2015NewLine        :this() { Offset = offset; Pictures = pictures; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PictureProvider : IPictureProvider<PictureSet>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IObservable<PictureSet> GetPictures(int offset = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use Defer() so we can capture a copy of offsetDi2015NewLine        // for each observer that subscribes (so multipleDi2015NewLine        // observers do not update each other's offsetDi2015NewLine        return Observable.Defer<PictureSet>(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var localOffset = offset;Di2015NewLine            // Use Defer so we re-execute GetPageAsync()Di2015NewLine            // each time through the loop.Di2015NewLine            // Update localOffset after each GetPageAsync()Di2015NewLine            // completes so that the next call to GetPageAsync()Di2015NewLine            // uses the next offsetDi2015NewLine            return Observable.Defer(() => GetPageAsync(localOffset))Di2015NewLine                .Select(pictures =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var s = new PictureSet(localOffset, pictures);Di2015NewLine                        localOffset += pictures.Count;Di2015NewLine                    })Di2015NewLine                .Repeat()Di2015NewLine                .TakeWhile(pictureSet => pictureSet.Pictures.Count > 0);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private async Task<IList<Picture>> GetPageAsync(int offset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = await BoringWebServiceCallAsync(offset);Di2015NewLine        result = data.Pictures.ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this version uses Observable.Run() (which just uses Task.Run under the hood)Di2015NewLine    // in case you cannot convert yourDi2015NewLine    // web service call to be asynchronousDi2015NewLine    private IObservable<IList<Picture>> GetPageAsync(int offset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = new List<Picture>();Di2015NewLine            ... boring web service call hereDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17397623Di2015UniqueSeparator        private List<DateTime> getWeekDays(DateTime dt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<DateTime> result = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int month = dt.Month;Di2015NewLine            dt = dt.AddDays(-dt.Day + 1);//Sets dt to first day of monthDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If dt is a weekend add days to move it to Monday (your while loop below will handle the rest)Di2015NewLine            if(dt.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt = dt.AddDays(2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (dt.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt = dt.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Adds the week day and stops when next month is reached.Di2015NewLine            while (dt.Month == month)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(dt);Di2015NewLine                dt = dt.AddDays(dt.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Friday ? 3 : 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17403155Di2015UniqueSeparator<!--Di2015NewLine^(?<gtin>\\(01\\))(?<comp_code>12345678)(?<part_code>\\d{5})0?(?<pd_ed>\\((?:11|17)\\))(?<date>\\d{6})(?<bat_no>\\((?:21|10)\\))(?<data_req>\\d{1,20}?)\\b(?<count>(?:\\(30\\))?)(?<data_opt>(?:\\d{1,8})?)$Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAssert position at the beginning of the string ^Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name gtin? (?<gtin>\\(01\\))Di2015NewLine   Match the character (? literally \\(Di2015NewLine   Match the characters 01? literally 01Di2015NewLine   Match the character )? literally \\)Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name comp_code? (?<comp_code>12345678)Di2015NewLine   Match the characters 12345678? literally 12345678Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name part_code? (?<part_code>\\d{5})Di2015NewLine   Match a single digit 0..9 \\d{5}Di2015NewLine      Exactly 5 times {5}Di2015NewLineMatch the character 0? literally 0?Di2015NewLine   Between zero and one times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) ?Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name pd_ed? (?<pd_ed>\\((?:11|17)\\))Di2015NewLine   Match the character (? literally \\(Di2015NewLine   Match the regular expression below (?:11|17)Di2015NewLine      Match either the regular expression below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) 11Di2015NewLine         Match the characters 11? literally 11Di2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 2 below (the entire group fails if this one fails to match) 17Di2015NewLine         Match the characters 17? literally 17Di2015NewLine   Match the character )? literally \\)Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name date? (?<date>\\d{6})Di2015NewLine   Match a single digit 0..9 \\d{6}Di2015NewLine      Exactly 6 times {6}Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name bat_no? (?<bat_no>\\((?:21|10)\\))Di2015NewLine   Match the character (? literally \\(Di2015NewLine   Match the regular expression below (?:21|10)Di2015NewLine      Match either the regular expression below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) 21Di2015NewLine         Match the characters 21? literally 21Di2015NewLine      Or match regular expression number 2 below (the entire group fails if this one fails to match) 10Di2015NewLine         Match the characters 10? literally 10Di2015NewLine   Match the character )? literally \\)Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name data_req? (?<data_req>\\d{1,20}?)Di2015NewLine   Match a single digit 0..9 \\d{1,20}?Di2015NewLine      Between one and 20 times, as few times as possible, expanding as needed (lazy) {1,20}?Di2015NewLineAssert position at a word boundary \\bDi2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name count? (?<count>(?:\\(30\\))?)Di2015NewLine   Match the regular expression below (?:\\(30\\))?Di2015NewLine      Between zero and one times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) ?Di2015NewLine      Match the character (? literally \\(Di2015NewLine      Match the characters 30? literally 30Di2015NewLine      Match the character )? literally \\)Di2015NewLineMatch the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name data_opt? (?<data_opt>(?:\\d{1,8})?)Di2015NewLine   Match the regular expression below (?:\\d{1,8})?Di2015NewLine      Between zero and one times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) ?Di2015NewLine      Match a single digit 0..9 \\d{1,8}Di2015NewLine         Between one and 8 times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) {1,8}Di2015NewLineAssert position at the end of the string (or before the line break at the end of the string, if any) $Di2015NewLine-->Di2015NewLine

17404676Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<TreeNode> TreeOrder(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TreeNode> nodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Find the root nodeDi2015NewLine    var root = nodes.Single(node => node.parent == null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Build an inverse lookup from parent id to children idsDi2015NewLine    var childrenLookup = nodesDi2015NewLine        .Where(node => node.parent != null)Di2015NewLine        .ToLookup(node => node.parent.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return TreeOrder(root, childrenLookup);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<TreeNode> TreeOrder(Di2015NewLine    TreeNode root,Di2015NewLine    ILookup<Guid, TreeNode> childrenLookup)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    yield return root;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!childrenLookup.Contains(root.id))Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var child in childrenLookup[root.id])Di2015NewLine        foreach (var node in TreeOrder(child, childrenLookup))Di2015NewLine            yield return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17408819Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task WhenFileCreated(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine        return Task.FromResult(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine    FileSystemWatcher watcher = new FileSystemWatcher(Path.GetDirectoryName(path));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FileSystemEventHandler createdHandler = null;Di2015NewLine    RenamedEventHandler renamedHandler = null;Di2015NewLine    createdHandler = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Name == Path.GetFileName(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetResult(true);Di2015NewLine            watcher.Created -= createdHandler;Di2015NewLine            watcher.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    renamedHandler = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Name == Path.GetFileName(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetResult(true);Di2015NewLine            watcher.Renamed -= renamedHandler;Di2015NewLine            watcher.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    watcher.Created += createdHandler;Di2015NewLine    watcher.Renamed += renamedHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17408819Di2015UniqueSeparatorFileSystemWatcher

17409503Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T> ()  { return f => true;  }Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T> () { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                      Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.OrElse (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                       Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.AndAlso (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17411403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IExpression<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int NumberOfPossibilities();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>>> Possibilities();Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>> GetNthPossibility(int n);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17411403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ValueExpression<T> : IExpression<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public ValueExpression(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int NumberOfPossibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>>> Possibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new[] { new[] { this } };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>> GetNthPossibility(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new[] { this };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17411403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AndExpression<T> : IExpression<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IList<IExpression<T>> expressions;Di2015NewLine    public AndExpression(IList<IExpression<T>> expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.expressions = expressions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int NumberOfPossibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return expressions.Aggregate(1,Di2015NewLine            (acc, expression) => acc * expression.NumberOfPossibilities());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>>> IExpression<T>.Possibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(0, NumberOfPossibilities())Di2015NewLine            .Select(n => GetNthPossibility(n));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>> GetNthPossibility(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < expressions.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int count = expressions[i].NumberOfPossibilities();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var value in expressions[i].GetNthPossibility(n % count))Di2015NewLine                yield return value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            n /= count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17411403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OrExpression<T> : IExpression<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IList<IExpression<T>> expressions;Di2015NewLine    public OrExpression(IList<IExpression<T>> expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.expressions = expressions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int NumberOfPossibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return expressions.Sum(expression => expression.NumberOfPossibilities());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>>> Possibilities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(0, NumberOfPossibilities())Di2015NewLine            .Select(n => GetNthPossibility(n));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<ValueExpression<T>> GetNthPossibility(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < expressions.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int count = expressions[i].NumberOfPossibilities();Di2015NewLine            if (n < count)Di2015NewLine                return expressions[i].GetNthPossibility(n);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                n -= count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17411403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PrintPossibilities<T>(IExpression<T> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(" + ", expression.Possibilities()Di2015NewLine            .Select(possibility =>Di2015NewLine                string.Concat(possibility.Select(value => value.Value)))));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17415760Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DupeNVC: NameValueCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _duplicateKey;Di2015NewLine    public DupeNVC(string duplicateKey = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _duplicateKey = duplicateKey;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string Get(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //check if duplicate key has been specifiedDi2015NewLine        //if not, then call the default Get implementationDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(_duplicateKey))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ArrayList list = (ArrayList)base.BaseGet(index);              Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int num = (list != null) ? list.Count : 0;Di2015NewLine            if (num == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (string)list[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (num > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder((string)list[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i < num; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //format our string and append the duplicate key specifiedDi2015NewLine                    stringBuilder.AppendFormat("&{0}=", _duplicateKey);Di2015NewLine                    stringBuilder.Append((string)list[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return stringBuilder.ToString();                   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine           return base.Get(index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

///     checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private void OnUpdate(object sender, GameTimerEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector2 vector = new Vector2();Di2015NewLine            while (TouchPanel.IsGestureAvailable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var gestureSample = TouchPanel.ReadGesture();Di2015NewLine                var vector2 = gestureSample.Delta;Di2015NewLine                vector2.Normalize();Di2015NewLine                vector = new Vector2((float) Math.Round(vector2.X), (float) Math.Round(vector2.Y));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Direction direction = new Direction();Di2015NewLine            if (vector.X > 0)             case Direction.None:Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case Direction.Up:Di2015NewLine                    if (GetTile(_player.X, _player.Y - 1) == 0)Di2015NewLine                        newPos = new Point(_player.X, _player.Y - 1);Di2015NewLine                    else return;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Direction.Down:Di2015NewLine                    if (GetTile(_player.X, _player.Y + 1) == 0)Di2015NewLine                        newPos = new Point(_player.X, _player.Y + 1);Di2015NewLine                    else return;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Direction.Left:Di2015NewLine                    if (GetTile(_player.X - 1, _player.Y) == 0)Di2015NewLine                        newPos = new Point(_player.X - 1, _player.Y);Di2015NewLine                    else return;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Direction.Right:Di2015NewLine                    if (GetTile(_player.X + 1, _player.Y) == 0)Di2015NewLine                        newPos = new Point(_player.X + 1, _player.Y);Di2015NewLine                    else return;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetTile(_player.X, _player.Y, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetTile(newPos.X, newPos.Y, 2);Di2015NewLine            _player = newPos;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int GetTile(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _levels[y*4 + x];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine
