17416601Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing
17416601Di2015UniqueSeparatortry-catch
17416604Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>                                                                                            Di2015NewLine    /// Compute the forward or inverse Fourier Transform of data, with data                                  Di2015NewLine    /// containing complex valued data as alternating real and imaginary                                     Di2015NewLine    /// parts. The length must be a power of 2. This method caches values                                    Di2015NewLine    /// and should be slightly faster on than the FFT method for repeated uses.                              Di2015NewLine    /// It is also slightly more accurate. Data is transformed in place.                                     Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>                                                                                           Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data">The complex data stored as alternating real                                       Di2015NewLine    /// and imaginary parts</param>                                                                          Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="forward">true for a forward transform, false for                                        Di2015NewLine    /// inverse transform</param>                                                                            Di2015NewLine    public void TableFFT(double[] data, bool forward)                                                        Di2015NewLine    {                                                                                                        Di2015NewLine        var n = data.Length;                                                                                 Di2015NewLine        // checks n is a power of 2 in 2's complement format                                                 Di2015NewLine        if ((n & (n - 1)) != 0)                                                                              Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(                                                                     Di2015NewLine                "data length " + n + " in FFT is not a power of 2"                                           Di2015NewLine                );                                                                                           Di2015NewLine        n /= 2;    // n is the number of samples                                                             Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Reverse(data, n); // bit index data reversal                                                         Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // make table if needed                                                                              Di2015NewLine        if ((cosTable == null) || (cosTable.Length != n))                                                    Di2015NewLine            Initialize(n);                                                                                   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do transform: so single point transforms, then doubles, etc.                                      Di2015NewLine        double sign = forward ? B : -B;                                                                      Di2015NewLine        var mmax = 1;                                                                                        Di2015NewLine        var tptr = 0;                                                                                        Di2015NewLine        while (n > mmax)                                                                                     Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            var istep = 2 * mmax;                                                                            Di2015NewLine            for (var m = 0; m < istep; m += 2)                                                               Di2015NewLine            {                                                                                                Di2015NewLine                var wr = cosTable[tptr];                                                                     Di2015NewLine                var wi = sign * sinTable[tptr++];                                                            Di2015NewLine                for (var k = m; k < 2 * n; k += 2 * istep)                                                   Di2015NewLine                {                                                                                            Di2015NewLine                    var j = k + istep;                                                                       Di2015NewLine                    var tempr = wr * data[j] - wi * data[j + 1];                                             Di2015NewLine                    var tempi = wi * data[j] + wr * data[j + 1];                                             Di2015NewLine                    data[j] = data[k] - tempr;                                                               Di2015NewLine                    data[j + 1] = data[k + 1] - tempi;                                                       Di2015NewLine                    data[k] = data[k] + tempr;                                                               Di2015NewLine                    data[k + 1] = data[k + 1] + tempi;                                                       Di2015NewLine                }                                                                                            Di2015NewLine            }                                                                                                Di2015NewLine            mmax = istep;                                                                                    Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // perform data scaling as needed                                                                    Di2015NewLine        Scale(data, n, forward);                                                                             Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>                                                                                            Di2015NewLine    /// Compute the forward or inverse Fourier Transform of data, with                                       Di2015NewLine    /// data containing real valued data only. The output is complex                                         Di2015NewLine    /// valued after the first two entries, stored in alternating real                                       Di2015NewLine    /// and imaginary parts. The first two returned entries are the real                                     Di2015NewLine    /// parts of the first and last value from the conjugate symmetric                                       Di2015NewLine    /// output, which are necessarily real. The length must be a power                                       Di2015NewLine    /// of 2.                                                                                                Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>                                                                                           Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data">The complex data stored as alternating real                                       Di2015NewLine    /// and imaginary parts</param>                                                                          Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="forward">true for a forward transform, false for                                        Di2015NewLine    /// inverse transform</param>                                                                            Di2015NewLine    public void RealFFT(double[] data, bool forward)                                                         Di2015NewLine    {                                                                                                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var n = data.Length; // # of real inputs, 1/2 the complex length                                     Di2015NewLine        // checks n is a power of 2 in 2's complement format                                                 Di2015NewLine        if ((n & (n - 1)) != 0)                                                                              Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(                                                                     Di2015NewLine                "data length " + n + " in FFT is not a power of 2"                                           Di2015NewLine                );                                                                                           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sign = -1.0; // assume inverse FFT, this controls how algebra below works                        Di2015NewLine        if (forward)                                                                                         Di2015NewLine        { // do packed FFT. This can be changed to FFT to save memory                                        Di2015NewLine            TableFFT(data, true);                                                                            Di2015NewLine            sign = 1.0;                                                                                      Di2015NewLine            // scaling - divide by scaling for N/2, then mult by scaling for N                               Di2015NewLine            if (A != 1)                                                                                      Di2015NewLine            {                                                                                                Di2015NewLine                var scale = Math.Pow(2.0, (A - 1) / 2.0);                                                    Di2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < data.Length; ++i)                                                        Di2015NewLine                    data[i] *= scale;                                                                        Di2015NewLine            }                                                                                                Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var theta = B * sign * 2 * Math.PI / n;                                                              Di2015NewLine        var wpr = Math.Cos(theta);                                                                           Di2015NewLine        var wpi = Math.Sin(theta);                                                                           Di2015NewLine        var wjr = wpr;                                                                                       Di2015NewLine        var wji = wpi;                                                                                       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var j = 1; j <= n/4; ++j)                                                                       Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            var k = n / 2 - j;                                                                               Di2015NewLine            var tkr = data[2 * k];    // real and imaginary parts of t_k  = t_(n/2 - j)                      Di2015NewLine            var tki = data[2 * k + 1];                                                                       Di2015NewLine            var tjr = data[2 * j];    // real and imaginary parts of t_j                                     Di2015NewLine            var tji = data[2 * j + 1];                                                                       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var a = (tjr - tkr) * wji;                                                                       Di2015NewLine            var b = (tji + tki) * wjr;                                                                       Di2015NewLine            var c = (tjr - tkr) * wjr;                                                                       Di2015NewLine            var d = (tji + tki) * wji;                                                                       Di2015NewLine            var e = (tjr + tkr);                                                                             Di2015NewLine            var f = (tji - tki);                                                                             Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // compute entry y[j]                                                                            Di2015NewLine            data[2 * j] = 0.5 * (e + sign * (a + b));                                                        Di2015NewLine            data[2 * j + 1] = 0.5 * (f + sign * (d - c));                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // compute entry y[k]                                                                            Di2015NewLine            data[2 * k] = 0.5 * (e - sign * (b + a));                                                        Di2015NewLine            data[2 * k + 1] = 0.5 * (sign * (d - c) - f);                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var temp = wjr;                                                                                  Di2015NewLine            // todo - allow more accurate version here? make option?                                         Di2015NewLine            wjr = wjr * wpr - wji * wpi;                                                                     Di2015NewLine            wji = temp * wpi + wji * wpr;                                                                    Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (forward)                                                                                         Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            // compute final y0 and y_{N/2}, store in data[0], data[1]                                       Di2015NewLine            var temp = data[0];                                                                              Di2015NewLine            data[0] += data[1];                                                                              Di2015NewLine            data[1] = temp - data[1];                                                                        Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine        else                                                                                                 Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            var temp = data[0]; // unpack the y0 and y_{N/2}, then invert FFT                                Di2015NewLine            data[0] = 0.5 * (temp + data[1]);                                                                Di2015NewLine            data[1] = 0.5 * (temp - data[1]);                                                                Di2015NewLine            // do packed inverse (table based) FFT. This can be changed to regular inverse FFT to save memoryDi2015NewLine            TableFFT(data, false);                                                                           Di2015NewLine            // scaling - divide by scaling for N, then mult by scaling for N/2                               Di2015NewLine            //if (A != -1) // todo - off by factor of 2? this works, but something seems weird               Di2015NewLine            {                                                                                                Di2015NewLine                var scale = Math.Pow(2.0, -(A + 1) / 2.0)*2;                                                 Di2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < data.Length; ++i)                                                        Di2015NewLine                    data[i] *= scale;                                                                        Di2015NewLine            }                                                                                                Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine    }                                                                                                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>                                                                                            Di2015NewLine    /// Determine how scaling works on the forward and inverse transforms.                                   Di2015NewLine    /// For size N=2^n transforms, the forward transform gets divided by                                     Di2015NewLine    /// N^((1-a)/2) and the inverse gets divided by N^((1+a)/2). Common                                      Di2015NewLine    /// values for (A,B) are                                                                                 Di2015NewLine    ///     ( 0, 1)  - default                                                                               Di2015NewLine    ///     (-1, 1)  - data processing                                                                       Di2015NewLine    ///     ( 1,-1)  - signal processing                                                                     Di2015NewLine    /// Usual values for A are 1, 0, or -1                                                                   Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>                                                                                           Di2015NewLine    public int A { get; set; }                                                                               Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>                                                                                            Di2015NewLine    /// Determine how phase works on the forward and inverse transforms.                                     Di2015NewLine    /// For size N=2^n transforms, the forward transform uses an                                             Di2015NewLine    /// exp(B*2*pi/N) term and the inverse uses an exp(-B*2*pi/N) term.                                      Di2015NewLine    /// Common values for (A,B) are                                                                          Di2015NewLine    ///     ( 0, 1)  - default                                                                               Di2015NewLine    ///     (-1, 1)  - data processing                                                                       Di2015NewLine    ///     ( 1,-1)  - signal processing                                                                     Di2015NewLine    /// Abs(B) should be relatively prime to N.                                                              Di2015NewLine    /// Setting B=-1 effectively corresponds to conjugating both input and                                   Di2015NewLine    /// output data.                                                                                         Di2015NewLine    /// Usual values for B are 1 or -1.                                                                      Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>                                                                                           Di2015NewLine    public int B { get; set; } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>                                                                                            Di2015NewLine    /// Scale data using n samples for forward and inverse transforms as needed                              Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>                                                                                           Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data"></param>                                                                          Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="n"></param>                                                                             Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="forward"></param>                                                                       Di2015NewLine    void Scale(double[] data, int n, bool forward)                                                           Di2015NewLine    {                                                                                                        Di2015NewLine        // forward scaling if needed                                                                         Di2015NewLine        if ((forward) && (A != 1))                                                                           Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            var scale = Math.Pow(n, (A - 1) / 2.0);                                                          Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < data.Length; ++i)                                                            Di2015NewLine                data[i] *= scale;                                                                            Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // inverse scaling if needed                                                                         Di2015NewLine        if ((!forward) && (A != -1))                                                                         Di2015NewLine        {                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine            var scale = Math.Pow(n, -(A + 1) / 2.0);                                                         Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < data.Length; ++i)                                                            Di2015NewLine                data[i] *= scale;                                                                            Di2015NewLine        }                                                                                                    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17416612Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar conditionalOrderBy = Projections.ConditionalDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    Restrictions.IsNull("CommonName") // or LastName, not sure from a question snippetDi2015NewLine  , Projections.Property("FirstName")Di2015NewLine  , Projections.Property("CommonName") // or LastNameDi2015NewLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar list = criteria.GetExecutableCriteria(session)  Di2015NewLine  .AddOrder(new Order(conditionalOrderBy, true))Di2015NewLine  .List<Person>()Di2015NewLine;Di2015NewLine

17417705Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AsyncSocketTest test = new AsyncSocketTest();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        test.SocketTest();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class AsyncSocketTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Socket socket;Di2015NewLine    private byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool keepRunning;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SocketTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Starting connect...");Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        buffer = new byte[65536];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        keepRunning = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // connect to antiduh.com's web serverDi2015NewLine        socket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine        socket.BeginConnect(IPAddress.Parse("129.21.49.41"), 80, new AsyncCallback(OnConnect), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Keep the main thread alive while all of the async requests run.Di2015NewLine        while (keepRunning) { Thread.Sleep(500); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Quitting.");Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnConnect(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (result.IsCompleted == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Out.WriteLine("OnConnect got incomplete result: " + result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                socket.EndConnect(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result.IsCompleted == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Out.WriteLine("OnConnect got incomplete result: " + result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Out.WriteLine("Sending...");Di2015NewLine                    byte[] requestBytes;Di2015NewLine                    string requestString =Di2015NewLine                        "GET / HTTP/1.1\\n" +Di2015NewLine                        "Host: antiduh.com\\n" +Di2015NewLine                        "\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    requestBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(requestString);Di2015NewLine                    socket.Send(requestBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Out.WriteLine("Starting receive...");Di2015NewLine                    socket.BeginReceive(Di2015NewLine                        buffer, Di2015NewLine                        0, Di2015NewLine                        buffer.Length, Di2015NewLine                        SocketFlags.None, Di2015NewLine                        new AsyncCallback(OnReceive),Di2015NewLine                        nullDi2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Out.WriteLine("Caught exception in OnConnect: " + e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Out.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnReceive(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int received = socket.EndReceive(result);Di2015NewLine        string responseStr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Received data: Length: {0}. Data: \\r\\n\\r\\n", received);Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        responseStr = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buffer, 0, received);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine(responseStr);Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        socket.Close();Di2015NewLine        keepRunning = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17418393Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ObservableCollection<item> Records { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ConstructorDi2015NewLinepublic Page3()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.Records = new ObservableCollection<item>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.items.ItemsSource = this.Records;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void AddItem()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Thanks to the ObservableCollection,Di2015NewLine    // the listbox is notified that you're adding a new item to the source collection,Di2015NewLine    // and will automatically refresh its contentsDi2015NewLine    this.Records.Add(new item { Item = DateTime.Now.ToString() });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17426229Di2015UniqueSeparator    string Complement(string floorPlan)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = rand.Next(floorPlan.Length); //get a random integer within array boundsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (floorPlan[index] != 'H' || floorPlan[index] != 'V') // if we didn't grab a letter, returnDi2015NewLine            return floorPlan;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int start = index; //we'll need to find the start of the 'letter group'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = index; i >= 0; i--) // work backwards through the stringDi2015NewLine            if (floorPlan[i] == 'H' || floorPlan[i] == 'V') // updating if we find another letterDi2015NewLine                start = i;Di2015NewLine            else // break when we don'tDi2015NewLine                break;            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(floorPlan); // use a string builder for ease of char replacementDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = start; i < floorPlan.Length; i++) // using the start index, interate throughDi2015NewLine            if (floorPlan[i] == 'V') // and replace accordinglyDi2015NewLine                sb[i] = 'H';Di2015NewLine            else if (floorPlan[i] == 'H')Di2015NewLine                sb[i] = 'V';Di2015NewLine            else // breaking when we encounter a numberDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17430284Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<Point> OptimizeCurve( List<Point> curve ) {Di2015NewLine  const float tolerance = 1.5f;Di2015NewLine  const double error    = 100.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Remember the first point in the series.Di2015NewLine  Point startPoint = curve.First();Di2015NewLine  // Simplify the input curve.Di2015NewLine  List<Point> simplified = Douglas.DouglasPeuckerReduction( curve, tolerance ).ToList();Di2015NewLine  // Create a new curve from the simplified one.Di2015NewLine  List<System.Windows.Point> fitted = FitCurves.FitCurve( simplified.Select( p => new System.Windows.Point( p.X, p.Y ) ).ToArray(), error );Di2015NewLine  // Convert the points back to our desired type.Di2015NewLine  List<Point> fittedPoints = fitted.Select( p => new Point( (int)p.X, (int)p.Y ) ).ToList();Di2015NewLine  // Add back our first point.Di2015NewLine  fittedPoints.Insert( 0, startPoint );Di2015NewLine  return fittedPoints;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17430673Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class CaseInsensitiveExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (insideContains)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Type == typeof (String))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var methodInfo = typeof (String).GetMethod("ToLower", new Type[] {});Di2015NewLine                var expression = Expression.Call(node, methodInfo);Di2015NewLine                return expression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Boolean insideContains = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.Method.Name == "Contains")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (insideContains) throw new 17432792Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceBehavior(ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Multiple)]Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class TestServerConfig : ConfigBase, ITestInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ReaderWriterLockSlim updateLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private SortedList<string, DateTime> dates = new SortedList<string, DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTime GetDate(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            this.updateLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine            if (this.dates.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.dates[key];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.updateLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void SetDate(string key, DateTime expirationDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.updateLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.dates.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.dates[key] = expirationDate;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.dates.Add(key, expirationDate);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             this.updateLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17432792Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceBehavior(ConcurrencyMode = ConcurrencyMode.Multiple)]Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class TestServerConfig : ConfigBase, ITestInterfaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ConcurrentDictionary<string, DateTime> dates = new ConcurrentDictionary<string, DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTime GetDate(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.dates.TryGetValue(key, out result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void SetDate(string key, DateTime expirationDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dates.AddOrUpdate(key, expirationDate, (usedKey, oldValue) => expirationDate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17433319Di2015UniqueSeparatorCustomListBoxItem
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparatorlistBox_MouseMove
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void listBox_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool itemFound = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < listBox.Items.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var currentItem = listBox.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(i) as CustomListBoxItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentItem == null) Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check whether the cursor is on an item or not.Di2015NewLine            if (IsMouseOverItem(currentItem, e.GetPosition((IInputElement)currentItem)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Unselect all items before selecting the new groupDi2015NewLine                listBox.Items.Cast<CustomListBoxItem>().ToList().ForEach(x => x.IsVirtuallySelected = false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Select the current item and the ones above itDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j <= listBox.Items.IndexOf(currentItem); j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ((CustomListBoxItem)listBox.Items[j]).IsVirtuallySelected = true; Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                itemFound = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the item wasn't found for the mouse point, it means the pointer is not over any item, so unselect all.Di2015NewLine        if (!itemFound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listBox.Items.Cast<CustomListBoxItem>().ToList().ForEach(x => x.IsVirtuallySelected = false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsMouseOverItem
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparator private bool IsMouseOverItem(Visual item, Point mouseOverPoint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Rect currentDescendantBounds = VisualTreeHelper.GetDescendantBounds(item);Di2015NewLine        return currentDescendantBounds.Contains(mouseOverPoint);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparatorlistBox_SelectedChanged
17433319Di2015UniqueSeparator private void listBox_SelectionChanged(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get all the virtually selected itemsDi2015NewLine        List<CustomListBoxItem> selectedItems =Di2015NewLine            listBox.Items.Cast<CustomListBoxItem>().Where(x => x.IsVirtuallySelected).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (selectedItems == null || !selectedItems.Any())Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do something with the selected itemsDi2015NewLine        DoCoolStuffWithSelectedItems();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unselsect all.Di2015NewLine        listBox.Items.Cast<CustomListBoxItem>().ToList().ForEach(x => x.IsVirtuallySelected = false);Di2015NewLine        listBox.UnselectAll();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17440463Di2015UniqueSeparator        EXCEL.Application excel = new EXCEL.Application();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            EXCEL.Workbook book = excel.Application.Workbooks.Open(path);Di2015NewLine            EXCEL.Worksheet sheet = book.Worksheets[1];Di2015NewLine            // yout operationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) { MessageBox.Show("readExcel:" + ex.Message); }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            KillExcel(excel);Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int GetWindowThreadProcessId(IntPtr hWnd, out int ProcessId);Di2015NewLine    private static void KillExcel(EXCEL.Application theApp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int id = 0;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr intptr = new IntPtr(theApp.Hwnd);Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Process p = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GetWindowThreadProcessId(intptr, out id);Di2015NewLine            p = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById(id);Di2015NewLine            if (p != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p.Kill();Di2015NewLine                p.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show("KillExcel:" + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17440469Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, Func<object, object>> PropertyGetters { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, Action<object, object>> PropertySetters { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<object, object> CreateGetter(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("property");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var getter = property.GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLine        if (getter == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The specified property does not have a public accessor.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var genericMethod = typeof(Helper).GetMethod("CreateGetterGeneric");Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo genericHelper = genericMethod.MakeGenericMethod(property.DeclaringType, property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        return (Func<object, object>)genericHelper.Invoke(null, new object[] { getter });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<object, object> CreateGetterGeneric<T, R>(MethodInfo getter) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<T, R> getterTypedDelegate = (Func<T, R>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<T, R>), getter);Di2015NewLine        Func<object, object> getterDelegate = (Func<object, object>)((object instance) => getterTypedDelegate((T)instance));Di2015NewLine        return getterDelegate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Action<object, object> CreateSetter(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("property");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var setter = property.GetSetMethod();Di2015NewLine        if (setter == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The specified property does not have a public setter.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var genericMethod = typeof(Helper).GetMethod("CreateSetterGeneric");Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo genericHelper = genericMethod.MakeGenericMethod(property.DeclaringType, property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        return (Action<object, object>)genericHelper.Invoke(null, new object[] { setter });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Action<object, object> CreateSetterGeneric<T, V>(MethodInfo setter) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action<T, V> setterTypedDelegate = (Action<T, V>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<T, V>), setter);Di2015NewLine        Action<object, object> setterDelegate = (Action<object, object>)((object instance, object value) => { setterTypedDelegate((T)instance, (V)value); });Di2015NewLine        return setterDelegate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Helper(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var Properties = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine                    .Where(p => p.CanRead && !p.GetIndexParameters().Any()).AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine        PropertyGetters = Properties.ToDictionary(p => p.Name, p => CreateGetter(p));Di2015NewLine        PropertySetters = Properties.Where(p => p.GetSetMethod() != null)Di2015NewLine            .ToDictionary(p => p.Name, p => CreateSetter(p));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17447920Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic double ComputeCoeff(double[] values1, double[] values2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(values1.Length != values2.Length)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("values must be the same length");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var avg1 = values1.Average();Di2015NewLine    var avg2 = values2.Average();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sum1 = values1.Zip(values2, (x1, y1) => (x1 - avg1) * (y1 - avg2)).Sum();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sumSqr1 = values1.Sum(x => Math.Pow((x - avg1), 2.0));Di2015NewLine    var sumSqr2 = values2.Sum(y => Math.Pow((y - avg2), 2.0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = sum1 / Math.Sqrt(sumSqr1 * sumSqr2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17447920Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar values1 = new List<double> { 3, 2, 4, 5 ,6 };Di2015NewLinevar values2 = new List<double> { 9, 7, 12 ,15, 17 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = ComputeCoeff(values1.ToArray(), values2.ToArray());Di2015NewLine// 0.997054485501581Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(result.ToString("F6") == "0.997054");Di2015NewLine

17448492Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class Utf8String : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr iPtr;Di2015NewLine    public IntPtr IntPtr { get { return iPtr; } }Di2015NewLine    public int BufferLength { get { return iBufferSize; } }Di2015NewLine    int iBufferSize;Di2015NewLine    public Utf8String(string aValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (aValue == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            iPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(aValue);Di2015NewLine            iPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(bytes.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(bytes, 0, iPtr, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.WriteByte(iPtr, bytes.Length, 0);Di2015NewLine            iBufferSize = bytes.Length + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (iPtr != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(iPtr);Di2015NewLine            iPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17448492Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static SpotifySession Create(SpotifySessionConfig config)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr sessionPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr listenerToken;Di2015NewLine    using (var cacheLocation = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.CacheLocation))Di2015NewLine    using (var settingsLocation = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.SettingsLocation))Di2015NewLine    using (var userAgent = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.UserAgent))Di2015NewLine    using (var deviceId = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.DeviceId))Di2015NewLine    using (var proxy = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.Proxy))Di2015NewLine    using (var proxyUsername = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.ProxyUsername))Di2015NewLine    using (var proxyPassword = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.ProxyPassword))Di2015NewLine    using (var traceFile = SpotifyMarshalling.StringToUtf8(config.TraceFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr appKeyPtr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        listenerToken = ListenerTable.PutUniqueObject(config.Listener, config.UserData);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NativeCallbackAllocation.AddRef();Di2015NewLine            byte[] appkey = config.ApplicationKey;Di2015NewLine            appKeyPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(appkey.Length);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(config.ApplicationKey, 0, appKeyPtr, appkey.Length);Di2015NewLine            sp_session_config nativeConfig = new sp_session_config {Di2015NewLine                api_version = config.ApiVersion,Di2015NewLine                cache_location = cacheLocation.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                settings_location = settingsLocation.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                application_key = appKeyPtr,Di2015NewLine                application_key_size = (UIntPtr)appkey.Length,Di2015NewLine                user_agent = userAgent.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                callbacks = SessionDelegates.CallbacksPtr,Di2015NewLine                userdata = listenerToken,Di2015NewLine                compress_playlists = config.CompressPlaylists,Di2015NewLine                dont_save_metadata_for_playlists = config.DontSaveMetadataForPlaylists,Di2015NewLine                initially_unload_playlists = config.InitiallyUnloadPlaylists,Di2015NewLine                device_id = deviceId.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                proxy = proxy.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                proxy_username = proxyUsername.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                proxy_password = proxyPassword.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine                tracefile = traceFile.IntPtr,Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            // Note: sp_session_create will invoke a callback, so it's important thatDi2015NewLine            // we have already done ListenerTable.PutUniqueObject before this point.Di2015NewLine            var error = NativeMethods.sp_session_create(ref nativeConfig, ref sessionPtr);Di2015NewLine 17455411Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void TrimRedundantSpaces(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        char previousChar = '\\0';Di2015NewLine        bool inSingleQuote = false;Di2015NewLine        bool inDoubleQuote = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (input[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case '\\'':Di2015NewLine                    if (! inDoubleQuote)Di2015NewLine                        inSingleQuote = !inSingleQuote;Di2015NewLine                    output.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case '"':Di2015NewLine                    if (! inSingleQuote)Di2015NewLine                        inDoubleQuote = !inDoubleQuote;Di2015NewLine                    output.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ' ':Di2015NewLine                    if ((previousChar != ' ') || inSingleQuote || inDoubleQuote)Di2015NewLine                        output.Append(' ');Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    output.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previousChar = input[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(output.ToString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TrimRedundantSpaces("sqlcmd.exe    -Q 'LEAVE     SQL TEXT HERE   UNCHANGED BECAUSE IT'S IN A DBL QUOTE BLOCK'");Di2015NewLine        TrimRedundantSpaces("sqlcmd.exe    -Q \\"LEAVE     SQL TEXT HERE   UNCHANGED BECAUSE IT'S IN A DBL QUOTE BLOCK\\"");Di2015NewLine        TrimRedundantSpaces("sqlcmd.exe    -Q \\"LEAVE     'SQL TEXT' HERE   UNCHANGED BECAUSE IT'S IN A DBL QUOTE BLOCK\\"");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Enter random subset size: ");Di2015NewLine            size = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (returnList.Count < size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int randomInt = r.Next(incomingList.Count);Di2015NewLine            if (!returnList.Contains(incomingList[randomInt]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnList.Add(incomingList[randomInt]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17460965Di2015UniqueSeparator//Return all items from a IEnumerable(target) that has at least one matching Property(propertyName) Di2015NewLine//with its value contained in a IEnumerable(possibleValues)Di2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable GetFilteredList(IEnumerable target, string propertyName, IEnumerable searchValues)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Get target's T Di2015NewLine    var targetType = target.GetType().GetGenericArguments().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (targetType == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Should be IEnumerable<T>", "target");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get searchValues's TDi2015NewLine    var searchValuesType = searchValues.GetType().GetGenericArguments().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (searchValuesType == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Should be IEnumerable<T>", "searchValues");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a p parameter with the type T of the items in the -> target IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine    var containsLambdaParameter = Expression.Parameter(targetType, "p");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a property accessor using the property name -> p.#propertyName#Di2015NewLine    var property = Expression.Property(containsLambdaParameter, targetType, propertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a constant with the -> IEnumerable<T> searchValuesDi2015NewLine    var searchValuesAsConstant = Expression.Constant(searchValues, searchValues.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a method call -> searchValues.Contains(p.Id)Di2015NewLine    var containsBody = Expression.Call(typeof(Enumerable), "Contains", new[] { searchValuesType }, searchValuesAsConstant, property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a lambda expression with the parameter p -> p => searchValues.Contains(p.Id)Di2015NewLine    var containsLambda = Expression.Lambda(containsBody, containsLambdaParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create a constant with the -> IEnumerable<T> targetDi2015NewLine    var targetAsConstant = Expression.Constant(target, target.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Where(p => searchValues.Contains(p.Id))Di2015NewLine    var whereBody = Expression.Call(typeof(Enumerable), "Where", new[] { targetType }, targetAsConstant, containsLambda);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //target.Where(p => searchValues.Contains(p.Id))Di2015NewLine    var whereLambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<IEnumerable>>(whereBody).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return whereLambda.Invoke();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17466415Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<T> ToList<T>(this DataTable table) where T : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<PropertyInfo> properties = typeof(T).GetProperties().ToList();Di2015NewLine        List<T> result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var row in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var item = CreateItemFromRow<T>((DataRow)row, properties);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T CreateItemFromRow<T>(DataRow row, List<PropertyInfo> properties) where T : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T item = new T();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (row.Table.Columns.Contains(property.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (row[property.Name] != DBNull.Value)Di2015NewLine                    property.SetValue(item, row[property.Name], null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17468908Di2015UniqueSeparator  void Foo() {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Foo");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void Bar() {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Bar");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLine  Action x = Foo;Di2015NewLine  Action y = x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(x, y))Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("x was equal to y"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // creates new delegate instance: Di2015NewLine  // x = x + Bar; Di2015NewLine  //   that is equal to Di2015NewLine  // x = Action.Combine(x, Bar);Di2015NewLine  //   so x is not equal to y any longer:Di2015NewLine  // x is a combined delegate (Foo + Bar)Di2015NewLine  // y is a delegate to Foo (an old version of x)Di2015NewLine  //   such a behavior is typical for operators (+, +=, etc.): Di2015NewLine  //   when we declare "public static MyType operator + (MyType a, MyType b)"Di2015NewLine  //   it means that a new object "c" will be created that'll equal to sum of a and b Di2015NewLine  x += Bar; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(x, y))Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("x is still equal to y");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  y();Di2015NewLine

17469507Di2015UniqueSeparator public void BatchBulkCopy(DataTable dataTable, string DestinationTbl, int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the DataTable Di2015NewLine    DataTable dtInsertRows = dataTable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (SqlBulkCopy sbc = new SqlBulkCopy(connectionString, SqlBulkCopyOptions.KeepIdentity))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sbc.DestinationTableName = DestinationTbl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Number of records to be processed in one goDi2015NewLine        sbc.BatchSize = batchSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add your column mappings hereDi2015NewLine        sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("field1","field3");Di2015NewLine        sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("foo","bar");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally write to serverDi2015NewLine        sbc.WriteToServer(dtInsertRows);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17469700Di2015UniqueSeparatorPartitioner
17469700Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private void run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double sum = 0;Di2015NewLine            Func<double, double> func = x => Math.Sqrt(Math.Sin(x));Di2015NewLine            object locker = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[] data = testData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // For each double in data[] we are going to calculate Math.Sqrt(Math.Sin(x)) andDi2015NewLine            // add all the results together.Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // To do this, we use class Partitioner to split the input array into just a few partitions,Di2015NewLine            // (the Partitioner will use knowledge about the number of processor cores to optimize this)Di2015NewLine            // and then add up all the values using a separate thread for each partition.Di2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLine            // We use threadLocalState to compute the total for each partition, and then we have toDi2015NewLine            // add all these together to get the final sum. We must lock the additon because it isn'tDi2015NewLine            // threadsafe, and several threads could be doing it at the same time.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Parallel.ForEachDi2015NewLine            (Di2015NewLine                Partitioner.Create(0, data.Length),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                () => 0.0,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                (subRange, loopState, threadLocalState) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = subRange.Item1; i < subRange.Item2; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        threadLocalState += func(data[i]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return threadLocalState;Di2015NewLine                },Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                finalThreadLocalState =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock (locker)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sum += finalThreadLocalState;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Sum = " + sum);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static double[] testData()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double[] array = new double[1000003]; // Test with an odd number of values.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Random rng = new Random(12345);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine                array[i] = rng.Next() & 3; // Don't want large values for this simple test.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return array;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program().run();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorEntityProperties
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyValues
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyValueList
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorInclude
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string PropertyName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<string> Values { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorIQueryable<T>
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FilterHelper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> Filter(this IQueryable<T> queryable, Context context, int userId) {Di2015NewLine        var entityName = typeof(T).Name;Di2015NewLine        //get all filters for the current entity by userId, Select the needed values as a `List<Filter>()`Di2015NewLine        //this could be done out of this method and used as a parameterDi2015NewLine        var filters = context.EntityPropertiesDi2015NewLine                      .Where(m => m.entityName == entityName && m.userId = userId)Di2015NewLine                      .Include(m => m.PropertyValueList)Di2015NewLine                      .Select(m => new Filter {Di2015NewLine                          PropertyName = m.property,Di2015NewLine                          Values = m.PropertyValueList.Select(x => x.value).ToList()Di2015NewLine                      })Di2015NewLine                      .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //build the expressionDi2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "m");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var member = GetContains( filters.First(), parameter);Di2015NewLine        member = filters.Skip(1).Aggregate(member, (current, filter) => Expression.And(current, GetContains(filter, parameter)));Di2015NewLine        //the final predicateDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(member, new[] { parameter });Di2015NewLine        //use Where with the final predicate on your QueryableDi2015NewLine        return queryable.Where(lambda);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this will build the "Contains" partDi2015NewLineprivate static Expression GetContains(Filter filter, Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression member = expression;Di2015NewLine        member = Expression.Property(member, filter.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine        var values = filter.Values.Select(m => Convert.ToInt32(m));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var containsMethod = typeof(Enumerable).GetMethods().Single(Di2015NewLine            method => method.Name == "Contains"Di2015NewLine                      && method.IsGenericMethodDefinitionDi2015NewLine                      && method.GetParameters().Length == 2)Di2015NewLine                      .MakeGenericMethod(new[] { typeof(int) });Di2015NewLine        member = Expression.Call(containsMethod, Expression.Constant(values), member);Di2015NewLine        return member;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17470677Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar orders = from order in Context.OrdersDi2015NewLine             select order;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar filteredOrders = orders.Filter(Context, 1);//where 1 is a userIdDi2015NewLine

17471070Di2015UniqueSeparator// it's a private class, so public fields are okayDi2015NewLineprivate class RetryingMessage<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Data;Di2015NewLine    public int RetriesRemaining;Di2015NewLine    public readonly List<Exception> Exceptions = new List<Exception>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IPropagatorBlock<TInput, TOutput>Di2015NewLine    CreateRetryingBlock<TInput, TOutput>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TInput, Task<TOutput>> transform, int numberOfRetries,Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan retryDelay, Action<IEnumerable<Exception>> failureHandler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var source = new TransformBlock<TInput, RetryingMessage<TInput>>(Di2015NewLine        input => new RetryingMessage<TInput>Di2015NewLine        { Data = input, RetriesRemaining = numberOfRetries });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TransformManyBlock, so that we can propagate zero results on failureDi2015NewLine    TransformManyBlock<RetryingMessage<TInput>, TOutput> target = null;Di2015NewLine    target = new TransformManyBlock<RetryingMessage<TInput>, TOutput>(Di2015NewLine        async message =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new[] { await transform(message.Data) };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                message.Exceptions.Add(ex);Di2015NewLine                if (message.RetriesRemaining == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    failureHandler(message.Exceptions);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    message.RetriesRemaining--;Di2015NewLine                    Task.Delay(retryDelay)Di2015NewLine                        .ContinueWith(_ => target.Post(message));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    source.LinkTo(Di2015NewLine        target, new DataflowLinkOptions { PropagateCompletion = true });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return DataflowBlock.Encapsulate(source, target);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17472171Di2015UniqueSeparator // example looks close to yout issue, (checking removed for brevity) Di2015NewLine // call method GetRespository<poco>  dynamically on any object that implements ILuwDi2015NewLine // the result passed back is also dynamic. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public static dynamic GetDynamicRepository(ILuw iLuw, string pocoFullName)  {Di2015NewLine        //null checks removed for demo....Di2015NewLine        var pocoType = Type.GetType(pocoFullName);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = typeof(ILuw).GetMethod("GetRepository");Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo generic = method.MakeGenericMethod(pocoType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var IRepOfT = generic.Invoke(iLuw, null);Di2015NewLine        dynamic repOfT = IRepOfT;Di2015NewLine        return repOfT;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
17472171Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RepositoryFactory<TPoco> where TPoco : BaseObjectConstraintHere {Di2015NewLine    public IRepositoryBase<TPoco> GetRepository(DbContext context) {Di2015NewLine       // get the Pocotype for generic repository instantiationDi2015NewLine        var pocoTypes = new[] {typeof (TPoco)};  // but you can also extend to  <T,U>Di2015NewLine        Type repBaseType = GetRepositoryType(typeof(TPoco)); // get the best matching Class typeDi2015NewLine        // now make one of those please..Di2015NewLine        IRepositoryBase<TPoco> repository = InstantiateRepository(context, repBaseType, pocoTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return repository;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Type GetRepositoryType(Type T) { Di2015NewLine        if (ConditionX) {Di2015NewLine            return typeof(RepositoryX<>);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return typeof (RepositoryY<>);Di2015NewLine    }  // note you can return Repository<,>   if the type requires 2 generic paramsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now instantiate Class Type with the Generic type passing in a constructor param  Di2015NewLine    private IRepositoryBase<TPoco> InstantiateRepository(BosBaseDbContext context, Type repType, params Type[] pocoTypes) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type repGenericType = repType.MakeGenericType(pocoTypes);Di2015NewLine        object repInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(repGenericType, context);Di2015NewLine        return (IRepositoryBase<TPoco>)repInstance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17478222Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static SqlDataAdapter CreateCustomerAdapter(Di2015NewLine    SqlConnection connection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SqlDataAdapter adapter = new SqlDataAdapter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the SelectCommand.Di2015NewLine    SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT * FROM Customers " +Di2015NewLine        "WHERE Country = @Country AND City = @City", connection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the parameters for the SelectCommand.Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@Country", SqlDbType.NVarChar, 15);Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@City", SqlDbType.NVarChar, 15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    adapter.SelectCommand = command;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the InsertCommand.Di2015NewLine    command = new SqlCommand(Di2015NewLine        "INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerID, CompanyName) " +Di2015NewLine        "VALUES (@CustomerID, @CompanyName)", connection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the parameters for the InsertCommand.Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@CustomerID", SqlDbType.NChar, 5, "CustomerID");Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@CompanyName", SqlDbType.NVarChar, 40, "CompanyName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    adapter.InsertCommand = command;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the UpdateCommand.Di2015NewLine    command = new SqlCommand(Di2015NewLine        "UPDATE Customers SET CustomerID = @CustomerID, CompanyName = @CompanyName " +Di2015NewLine        "WHERE CustomerID = @oldCustomerID", connection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the parameters for the UpdateCommand.Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@CustomerID", SqlDbType.NChar, 5, "CustomerID");Di2015NewLine    command.Parameters.Add("@CompanyName", SqlDbType.NVarChar, 40, "CompanyName");Di2015NewLine    SqlParameter parameter = command.Parameters.Add(Di2015NewLine        "@oldCustomerID", SqlDbType.NChar, 5, "CustomerID");Di2015NewLine    parameter.SourceVersion = DataRowVersion.Original;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    adapter.UpdateCommand = command;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the DeleteCommand.Di2015NewLine    command = new SqlCommand(Di2015NewLine        "DELETE FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID", connection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the parameters for the DeleteCommand.Di2015NewLine    parameter = command.Parameters.Add(Di2015NewLine        "@CustomerID", SqlDbType.NChar, 5, "CustomerID");Di2015NewLine    parameter.SourceVersion = DataRowVersion.Original;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    adapter.DeleteCommand = command;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return adapter;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17478516Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TResult ExecuteAndReturn<TProxy, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TProxy, TResult> delegateToExecute)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string endpointUri = ServiceEndpoints.GetServiceEndpoint(typeof(TProxy));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TResult valueToReturn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (ChannelFactory<TProxy> factory = new ChannelFactory<TProxy>(new BasicHttpBinding(), new EndpointAddress(endpointUri)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TProxy proxy = factory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        valueToReturn = delegateToExecute(proxy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return valueToReturn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17478526Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Convert(-5432));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString Convert(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return String.Join("",Digits(i).Reverse());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<char> Digits(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool neg = false;Di2015NewLine    if(i==0) {yield return '0'; yield break;}Di2015NewLine    if(i<0) { i = -i; neg = true;}Di2015NewLine    while (i!=0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char digit = (char)(i % 10 + '0');Di2015NewLine        i = i / 10;Di2015NewLine        yield return digit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(neg) yield return '-';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17479328Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinevar words = textBox1.Text.Split(new char[] { ' ', '"', ',',etc. },Di2015NewLine    StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineint index = 0;Di2015NewLineint prevIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineint prevWordWidth = 0;//This variable is now kept across iterationsDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < words.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string word = words[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //The non-scrambled string is from end of last word (prevIndex+prevWordWidth) Di2015NewLine    //up to the next word (index)Di2015NewLine    index = textBox1.Text.IndexOf(word, prevIndex+prevWordWidth);Di2015NewLine    string t = textBox1.Text.Substring(prevIndex+prevWordWidth, index-(prevIndex+prevWordWidth));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    prevIndex = index;Di2015NewLine    prevWordWidth = word.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(t);Di2015NewLine    string s = textBox1.Text.Substring(index, prevWordWidth);Di2015NewLine    if (index == -1) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (word.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ScrambleTextBoxText scrmbltb = new ScrambleTextBoxText(s.Trim());Di2015NewLine        scrmbltb.GetText();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(word.Replace(s.Trim(), scrmbltb.scrambledWord));             Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinetextBox2.Text = sb.ToString(); //Note how this is only set at the end.Di2015NewLine

17483099Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinqQueriesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo toLowerMethod = typeof(String).GetMethod("ToLower", Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo startsWithMethod= typeof(String).GetMethod("StartsWith", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo containsMethod = typeof(String).GetMethod("Contains", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo endsWithMethod= typeof(String).GetMethod("EndsWith", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> GetFilter(Expression<Func<T, string>> expression, Comparator comparator, string compareValue) {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameterExpression = null;Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = GetMemberExpression(expression.Body, out parameterExpression);Di2015NewLine        Expression constExp = Expression.Constant(compareValue);Di2015NewLine        switch (comparator) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case Comparator.Contains:Di2015NewLine          memberExpression = Expression.Call(memberExpression, containsMethod,constExp);Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine        case Comparator.StartsWith:Di2015NewLine          memberExpression = Expression.Call(memberExpression, startsWithMethod, constExp);Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine        //etc.Di2015NewLine        default :Di2015NewLine          memberExpression = Expression.Equal(memberExpression, constExp);Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(memberExpression, new[]{parameterExpression});Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static Expression GetMemberExpression(Expression expression, out ParameterExpression parameterExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parameterExpression = null;Di2015NewLine        if (expression is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var memberExpression = expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            while (!(memberExpression.Expression is ParameterExpression))Di2015NewLine                memberExpression = memberExpression.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            parameterExpression = memberExpression.Expression as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine            return expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (expression is MethodCallExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methodCallExpression = expression as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine            parameterExpression = methodCallExpression.Object as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine            return methodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
